subject: OS-7685 smartos-live overlay should be merged into illumos-joyent Reviewed by: Jerry Jelinek <jerry.jelinek@joyent.com> Reviewed by: Mike Gerdts <mike.gerdts@joyent.com> Approved by: Mike Gerdts <mike.gerdts@joyent.com>

Change has been successfully merged by John Levon
you can ignore this for now, this was just for my convenience
Why are we defining etc/curl here? curl isn't delivered from illumos-joyent.
Indeed, thanks. I'm just going to remove it now we deliver nothing into this directory.
Is the only way to handle /etc/system modifications by a boot module with path=etc/system?  No support for path=etc/system.d/blah?
I don't think it would work
Why was this moved into illumos-joyent? It doesn't seem to correspond with any software that we're shipping. Was this supposed to tie into libusb? Nothing implements the symbols defined here.
I have no idea. This was introduced originally via OS-307 but I don't know why we are shipping this file. Are you saying we should just stop doing so?
I think it was related to an old form of libusb. I suggest we remove it.
I know build_live replaces the field, but should we be shipping a value in the shadow overlay like this?
I don't know the reason why this was done originally. But since build_live is the only valid way to assemble a PI, I'm going to drop this part of overlay altogether.
delete
This is actually correct, it's produced by make-console-login-xml
delete

Yep, thanks, these show up in:

git ls-files -i --exclude-standard

(that list isn't empty of others, but no more from these changes)
